text: Sada Thompson (September 27, 1927 - May 4, 2011) was an American television, movie and stage actress. She acted in lots of stage plays, television shows and many very notable movies in her career. Thompson was born in Des Moines, Iowa. She died from lung disease while in Connecticut. title: Sada Thompson
